alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Rutherford; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rutherford, southeastern Wilson and northwestern Cannon Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Walterhill, or 10 miles northeast of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Watertown, Walterhill, Auburntown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Lascassas and Milton. This includes Interstate 840 between mile markers 63 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
